nodes.text: Thermon was a planet located within the Thermon system of the Mid Rim with many moons that spewed methane gas from geysers.

The planet was, however, under an embargo by the Houses of the Juvex sector. It had been collectively established as a penal colony by the houses of that sector, but these lost control to the criminal gangs incarcerated there. The house's attempt to retain control has only made the smuggling of the planet's ore more interesting for smugglers.
